body: I like that Shinachiku work, when it's just kid with kid. Not a guy with kid. So cute and beautiful btw ᕙ(  • ‿ •  )ᕗ
this is too adorable for me 11/10 pure sweet

this is a tough one to say but i have to to give myself closure. 
i am not gay i like women and kinda only sorta women. but every man no matter how in denial they are have a open minded side. 
for example a woman sees another woman and makes a remark about how she's cute or pretty no one bats a eye a man does it to another man something is wrong with his head. the man could be the straightest man in the universe and vomit at the sight of a naked man,but they can still make those remarks or have experiences in their childhood that give them that open mindedness. now why did i choose a shouta manga to make this comment? this isn't my first reading of one of these i just happen to be logged in and figured i would. just a fyi i don't support nor am i against the LGBT community. 
love is just that love. if you shove it down my throat i'm going to kick you in the throat if you tell me that lifestyle is disgusting i'm going to call your lifestyle disgusting. all y'all can hope for.

all of the hentai aside, I feel like shinachiku would make a cute slice of life manga with all of their characters, there personalities are all fleshed out pretty well and I honestly can't wait for the day that they publish one
Nice prequel to that other one
shinachiku really is the best! the cutest stuff uwu
Thank you roboghost... Your amazing for your translations.
Too cute. I can't take it.
